product_name: Mammut Mamook GTX Mountaineering Boots - Men's
long_description: For multiday mountaineering trips that have you hiking through dense forest, climbing rocky trails and crossing glaciers, wear the sturdy, waterproof, insulated Mammut Mamook GTX Mountaineering Boots. GORE-TEX(R) Insulated Comfort waterproof liners keep feet dry and comfortably warm during cold conditions and winter outdoor activities. Hybrid shell uppers provide excellent lateral support while still being flexible for comfort while hiking. 3-zone lacing system secures your feet inside the boots to help prevent rubbing. Patented Mammut Base Fit technology uses free-sliding bands to transfer the force of the lacing to the soles. Carbon shanks offer ample support while keeping the boots lightweight. Built-in neoprene gaiters help prevent debris and snow from getting in. Grippy Vibram(R) rubber outsoles provide excellent traction on slabby rocks and snowy slopes. Mammut Mamook GTX Mountaineering Boots are step-in crampon compatible.
short_description: For multiday mountaineering trips that have you hiking through dense forest, climbing rocky trails and crossing glaciers, wear the sturdy, waterproof, insulated Mammut Mamook GTX Mountaineering Boots.
